text: Umbone nganiuwa pagalauchisya ngope syenu upande wa kungopoko ni kundiwilo, nambo umbone (usyesyene) ni wa mundu jwankulupilile Allah, Lisiku Lyambesi, Malaika, Chitabu ni Achimitume, achipelekaga soni chipanje achichisakaga kwa wapaulongo, wawina, masikini, jwapaulendo, wakuwenda, ni kwaapela ulukosyo achikapolo, achiswaliji soni Swala nikutolaga Zaka, ni wakwanilisya ilanga yao pati atawenemo, ni wakupilila pakulaga, pakulwala ni pandema jangondo, wanganyao niwaasimichisye (Usilamu wao), soni wanyao niwali wakun'jogopa (Allah)
